name: Monster Book of Monsters
description:
In this game you crossbreed monsters to new species. Memorize the actions of your mating partner and mimic them afterwards , so that they are attracted to each other. 
Discover all monsters and read about their funny habits in the Monster Book of Monsters. Why do you think, Smaugon is known as the "King above the Mountain"?

Trivia:
You can find hints to Lord of the Rings, Harry Potter, Game of Thrones and World of Warcraft. 
How many can you find?

----- Background ------
The game was made within 5 days as part of the Halloween GameJam 2022 from Spelkollektivet.
We created everything by our own - except the music and soundeffects. The project was also meant to learn a bit about animating.

The breeding minigame itself is a test for our main project "Magical Harvest", where you can among other things crossbreed animals to magical creatures.
https://isavii.itch.io/magical-harvest-demo
